gurmukhi: myru hilE dhilE surloku dso ids BUDr Bwjq BwrI ]
transliteration: Mer(u) Halio Dahlio Surlok(u) Daso Dis Bhoodhar Bhaajat Bhdaroo||
translation: The Sumeru shook and the heaven was terrified and the big mountains began to move speedily in all the ten directions.

gurmukhi: cwil pirE iqh caudh lok mY bHm BieE mn mY BRm BwrI ]
transliteration: Dhaal(i) Pario Tih Chaudah Lok Mai Brahm Bhaio Man Mai Bhram Bhdaroo||
translation: In all the fourteen worlds there was great commotion and a great illusion was created in the mind of Brahma.

gurmukhi: iDAwn rihE n jtI su PtI Dr XO bil kY rn mY iklkwrI ]
transliteration: Dhiaan Rahio Na Jatoo Su Phatoo Dhar Yau Bal(i) Kai Ran Mai Kilkdaroo||
translation: The meditative state of Shiva was broken and the earth burst when with great force Kali shouted loudly.

gurmukhi: dYqn ky biD kwrn ko kr kwl sI kwlI kiRpwn sMBwrI ]166]
transliteration: Daitan Ke Badh(i) Kaaran Ko Kar Kaal Soo Kaaloo Kridaan Sanbhdaroo||166||
translation: In order to kill the demons, Kali hath taken the deathlike sword in her hand.166.

gurmukhi: cMfI kwlI duhuM imil kIno iehY ibcwr ]
transliteration: Channdoo Kaaloo Duhoon Mil(i) Koono Ihai Bichaar||
translation: Chandi and Kali both together took this decision;

gurmukhi: hau hinho qUM sRaun pI Air dil fwrih mwir ]167]
transliteration: Hau Haniho Toon Sraoun Poo Ar(i) Dal(i) Daarah(i) Daar(i)||167||
translation: “I shall kill the demons and thou drinkest their blood; in this way we shall kill all the enemies.”167.

gurmukhi: kwlI Aau kyhir sMig lY cMif su Gyry sBY bn jYsy dvw pY ]
transliteration: Kaaloo Au Kehar(i) San(i) Lai Channd(i) Su Gdere Sabhai Ban Jaise Davaa Pai||
translation: Taking Kali and the lion with her, Chandi besieged all the Raktavijas like the forest by the fire.

gurmukhi: cMf ky bwnn qyj pRBwv qy dYq jry jYsy eIt Avw pY ]
transliteration: Channd Ke Baanan Tej Prabhaav Te Dait Dare Jaise Oot Avaa Pai||
translation: With the power of the arrows of Chandi, the demons were burnt like bricks in the kiln.

gurmukhi: kwlkw sRaun pIE iqn ko kiv ny mn mY lIXo Bwau Bvw pY ]
transliteration: Kaalkaa Sraoun Pooo Tin Ko Kav(i) Ne Man Mai Looyo Bhaau Bhavaa Pai||
translation: Kali drank their blood and the poet hath created this image regarding Kali.

gurmukhi: mwnhu isMD ko nIr sBY imil Dwie kY jwie pry hY qvw pY ]168]
transliteration: Maanoh Sindh Ko Noor Sabhai Mil(i) Dhaae Kai Jaae Dare Hai Tavaa Pai||168||
translation: She accomplished the feat like the grand mythological opening in which the water of all the oceans merges.168.

gurmukhi: cMif hny Aru kwlkw kop kY sRaunq ibMdn so ieh kIno ]
transliteration: Channd(i) Hane Ar(u) Kaalkaa Kop Kai Sraounat Bindan So Ih Koono||
translation: The demons were killed by Chnadi and Kali in great rage treated the Raktavijas in this way;
